text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Cañar |official_name = Province of Cañar |other_name = |native_name = |nickname = |settlement_type = Province |total_type = |motto = |image_skyline = Ecuador ingapirca inca ruins.jpg |imagesize = |image_caption = Ingapirca |image_flag = Bandera Provincia Cañar.svg |flag_size = |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_shield = |shield_size = |image_blank_emblem = |blank_emblem_type = |blank_emblem_size = |image_map = Canar in Ecuador (+Galapagos).svg |mapsize = |map_caption = Cañar Province in Ecuador |image_map1 = Cantones de Cañar.png |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = Cantons of Cañar Province |image_dot_map = |dot_mapsize = |dot_map_caption = |dot_x = |dot_y = |pushpin_map = |pushpin_label_position = |pushpin_map_caption = |pushpin_mapsize = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |seat_type = Capital |seat = Azogues |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_title = Provincial Prefect |leader_name = |established_title = Settled |established_date = |established_title1 = Legal establishment |established_date1 = |named_for = |area_magnitude = |unit_pref = |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 3146.08 |area_land_km2 = |area_water_km2 = |area_total_sq_mi = |area_land_sq_mi = |area_water_sq_mi = |area_water_percent = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |elevation_max_m = |elevation_max_ft = |elevation_min_m = |elevation_min_ft = |population_as_of = 2010 census |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 225184 |population_density_km2 = auto |population_density_sq_mi= |timezone = ECT |utc_offset = |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |registration_plate = U |website = |footnotes = }} Cañar is a province in Ecuador. The capital is Azogues. == Cantons == The province is divided into 7 cantons. The following table lists each with its population at the time of the 2019 census, its area in square kilometres (km²), and the name of the canton seat or capital.Cantons of Ecuador. Statoids.com. Retrieved 4 November 2009. Canton Pop. (2019) Area (km²) Seat/Capital Azogues 85,030 613 Azogues Biblián 23,590 227 Biblián Cañar 68,190 1,804 Cañar Déleg 6,760 78 Déleg El Tambo 12,200 65 El Tambo Suscal 6,390 31 Suscal La Troncal 74,680 328 La Troncal ==References==
